00032 disk::disk(string plugin_id,map<string,string> properties ) 
00033 {
00034     // Customize if needed
00035     if(!initialize_plugin(properties))
00036         throw runtime_error("Disk plugin could not be initialized");
00037 }

00044 disk::~disk(void)
00045 {
00046     // Customize if needed
00047     sigar_close(sig_);
00048 
00049 }
00050 
00057 bool disk::initialize_plugin(map<string,string> properties) 
00058 {
00059     // Customize if needed
00060     sigar_open(&sig_);
00061 
00062     sigar_net_info_t net_info;
00063     sigar_net_info_get(sig_, &net_info);
00064     
00065     strcpy(hostname_,net_info.host_name);
00066     
00067     return true;
00068 }
00069 
00081 bool disk::generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00082                                             DDS_DynamicData *data)
00083 {
00084 
00085     data->set_string("hostname",
00086                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00087                      hostname_);
00088     
00089     sigar_file_system_list_get(sig_,&fslist_);
00090     
00091     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < fslist_.number; i++) {
00092         if(fslist_.data[i].type == SIGAR_FSTYPE_LOCAL_DISK ||
00093            fslist_.data[i].type == SIGAR_FSTYPE_NETWORK) {
00094             sigar_file_system_usage_t fsusage;
00095             sigar_file_system_usage_get(sig_,fslist_.data[i].dir_name,&fsusage);
00096 
00097             data->set_string("name",
00098                              DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00099                              fslist_.data[i].dev_name);
00100             
00101             data->set_string("mountdir",
00102                              DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00103                              fslist_.data[i].dir_name);
00104             
00105             // type = 2  FSTYPE_LOCAL_DISK
00106             // type = 3  FSTYPE_NETWORK
00107             data->set_long("type",
00108                            DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00109                            fslist_.data[i].type);
00110 
00111             data->set_long("total", 
00112                            DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00113                            fsusage.total);
00114 
00115             data->set_long("used", 
00116                            DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00117                            fsusage.used);
00118 
00119             data->set_long("free", 
00120                            DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00121                            fsusage.free);
00122 
00123             data->set_double("used_per",
00124                              DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00125                              fsusage.use_percent*100);
00126 
00127             data->set_double("free_per",
00128                              DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00129                              100.0-fsusage.use_percent*100);
00130 
00131             timestamp_ = time(NULL);
00132             data->set_long("ts",
00133                            DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00134                            timestamp_);
00135 
00136             
00137             if(!publish_information(writer, data))
00138                 return false;
00139 
00140         }
00141         
00142     }
00143     
00144     
00145     sigar_file_system_list_destroy(sig_,&fslist_);
00146     return true;
00147 }
